verses.name: Luke 21:32
verses.text: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.

verses.name: Luke 21:33
verses.text: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.

verses.name: Luke 21:34
verses.text: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.

verses.name: Luke 21:35
verses.text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.
